      • ackTimeout

        public H2KeepAlivePolicies.KeepAlivePolicyBuilder ackTimeout​(java.time.Duration ackTimeout)
        Set the maximum Duration to wait for an acknowledgment of a previously sent ping. If no acknowledgment is received, the connection will be closed.
        Parameters:
        ackTimeout - Duration to wait for an acknowledgment of a previously sent ping.
        Returns:
        this.
        See Also:
